text: Flame of the Argentine is a lostThe Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:..Flame of the Argentine 1926 American silent action film directed by Edward Dillon and starring Evelyn Brent, Orville Caldwell and Frank Leigh.Kear & King p.38The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:..Flame of the Argentine ==Cast== * Evelyn Brent as Inez Remírez * Orville Caldwell as Dan Prescott * Frank Leigh as Emilio Tovar * Daniel Makarenko as Marsini * Rosita Marstini as Madame Marsini * Evelyn Selbie as Nana * Florence Turner as Doña Aguila ==References== ==Bibliography== * Lynn Kear & James King. Evelyn Brent: The Life and Films of Hollywood's Lady Crook. McFarland, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1926 films Category:1920s action films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American action films Category:Films directed by Edward Dillon Category:American black-and-white films Category:Lost American films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films Category:1926 lost films
title: Flame of the Argentine
